term.name: Treatment and rehabilitation of narcotic addicts

bill.summary: 3/4/1993--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that any health care reform program enacted by the Congress should include provisions to prohibit discrimination in the provision of and payment for health care services against individuals who suffer from mental illness or substance abuse.
